Important Note: This file contains patterns that should be caught by proper security checks like:
1. String termination sequences ('); ...)
2. Template engine bypass attempts
3. Direct OS command execution patterns
4. Context-breaking return statements

A secure system should either:
- Block processing of this file entirely
- Escape all dangerous patterns to text content
- Throw validation errors during view generation

Always test in a sandboxed environment and remove after testing.
